data.text:
Paramount hotel was osm I very happy that I stay there . Nd making my stay most beautiful nd comfortable the credit  specially goes to Fawad housekeeoing aatff.. everything was perfect cinesocp staff was  respectable nd good ..
The swimming poolarea was cool nd sightful.the view is amazing frm top floor .
data.title: Ethicful nd excellent job

data.text: We arrived at the hotel after 11pm, check in was very fast. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Fawad from house keeping did an exceptional job with our room. Our room was very spacious and modern. The view was amazing. We really enjoyed our stay.
data.title: Wonderful Stay

data.text: Riya and Prashant have really been key to the experience of paramount hotel. It is a very nice hotel. Everything you wish for, but the employees make it truly feel like my second home. Love it!! When I came into the bar, they knew exactly what I wanted. Always very kind. And we‚Äôve had some interesting conversations. Love these people‚ù§Ô∏èüíØ Riya and Parahant I wish you all the beste in your life‚Äôs journeyüçÄ
data.title: 2e home

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Star,

Thank you for taking the time to share such wonderful feedback about your experience at Paramount Hotel Midtown. 
We are thrilled to hear that Riya and Prashant played a pivotal role in making your stay memorable. Our cast strives to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere, ensuring that every star feels right at home. Your words serve as a wonderful testament to their dedication and passion for hospitality.

It's delightful to know that you found everything you desired at our hotel and that our cast went above and beyond to anticipate your needs, making your visit truly special. We are especially touched by your kind words about the personalized service you received at the bar and the meaningful conversations shared.
Your heartfelt wishes for Riya and Prashant are sincerely appreciated and will be passed along to them. They are indeed valuable members of our cast, and we are fortunate to have them.

Once again, thank you for choosing Paramount Hotel Midtown, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable stay.

Kind regards,
Nicholas Chalmers
Director
Paramount Hotel Midtown
owner_response.author: Nicholas Chalmers

data.text:
Sipi was amazing! He is an amazing bartender, informative, helpful, super friendly and just great!! 
The place is really nice, drinks and the service was so nice. 
Thank you to all the staff, specially to Sipi! 
We will definitely come back again!
data.title: Sipi is great!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Star,

Thank you ever so much for sharing your wonderful review following your recent visit to Paramount Hotel Midtown. Your kind words have truly made our day!

We're thrilled to hear that Sipi left such a positive impression on you with his amazing bartending skills and exceptional service. Providing informative and friendly service is something we pride ourselves on, and it's fantastic to know that Sipi exceeded your expectations in this regard.

Moreover, we're delighted that you enjoyed the ambiance, drinks, and service during your time with us. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and we're delighted that we could contribute to a memorable experience for you.

We'll be sure to pass on your kind words to Sipi and the rest of our cast. Your feedback serves as a great source of motivation for us to continue delivering exceptional service to all our valued stars.

Thank you once again for choosing Paramount Hotel Midtown. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic experience in the near future!

Kind regards,
Nicholas Chalmers
Director
Paramount Hotel Midtown
owner_response.author: Nicholas Chalmers

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Star,

Thank you immensely for taking the time to share your glowing review of your recent stay at Paramount Hotel Midtown. Your kind words brightened our day!

We are thrilled to hear that Fawad, one of our dedicated cast members, made such a positive impression on you. Providing exceptional service and ensuring the utmost comfort of our stars is at the heart of everything we do. It's wonderful to know that Fawad went above and beyond to ensure your room was impeccably clean and stocked with all the amenities you needed for a comfortable stay.

We're delighted that you enjoyed our breakfast offerings and found our lobby luxurious. Moreover, it's fantastic to hear that you had a great time at our swimming pool area, soaking in the delightful ambiance.

Your feedback is truly appreciated and serves as motivation for our entire cast to continue delivering outstanding service and maintaining the highest standards throughout the hotel.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us, and we eagerly await the opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay in the future!

Kind regards,
Nicholas Chalmers
Director
Paramount Hotel Midtown
